event.title: Keynote about universal computing at Akademy, A Coruña, Galicia, Spain

body.p: On Saturday 25 July at 10:15 FSFE's Vice President Matthias Kirschner will give the community keynote at KDE's Akademy titled “An endangered species: the computer as a universal machine”. Akademy 2015 takes place in A Coruña, Galicia, Spain from the 25 to 31 July. The organisers also did an interview with Matthias about his background, motivation, how he joined Free Software, and some of his hobbies.
